verbs.description: [ARG0: illinois governor hopefuls] [V: clash] [ARG2: on taxes] lies at debate republican gov bruce rauner on thursday accused rival j b pritzker of plotting a massive income tax hike on the people of illinois a claim the democrat dismissed as another lie from a governor j b pritzker jb pritzker gov bruce rauner illinois gov bruce rauner sen sam mccann michael madigan sam mccann
